Home.title: Jello helps teams move work forward.
Home.description: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. From high rises to the home office, the way your team works is unique—accomplish it all with Jello.

Footer.addressDetail: 1 Dai Co Viet, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi, Vietnam
Footer.description: Helps your team to build the best projects with the best tools
Footer.additionalDescription: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. From high rises to the home office, the way your team works is unique—accomplish it all with Jello.
Footer.studentDescription: An IT student that helps teams to build the best projects with the best tools

Features.exploreFeatures: Explore the powerful features of Jello designed to streamline your team's workflow and boost productivity.
Features.taskManagementDescription: Take control of your workload with intuitive task lists, prioritization tools, and progress tracking. Easily assign tasks, set deadlines, and collaborate with your team in real-time.
Features.collaborationDescription: Foster seamless communication and teamwork. Stay on top of project updates and discussions, keeping everyone in the loop.
Features.analyticsDescription: Gain valuable insights into team performance and project progress with comprehensive analytics. Track key metrics, identify bottlenecks, and make data-driven decisions to optimize your workflow.

Contact.inquiriesQuestions: Feel free to reach out to us for any inquiries or questions.
Contact.haveQuestions: If you have any questions about our services or need assistance,please do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact.addressLine1: 1 Dai Co Viet, Hai Ba Trung
Contact.name: Name:
